cst235.servicepals.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • cst235.servicepals.controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The main controller for the application. All public methods are static so they can be accessed without making a Controller object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller()

      static boolean checkLoginCredentials(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Queries the users database for a user name and password match
      static void doCreateUser()
      Creates a new user of ServicePals
      static boolean doUserLogin()
      Logs in a user using username and password (allows up to three attempts)

      Processes the schedule request in the database (Creates a record)
      static void showMainMenu()
      The main menu where the application starts

    • Method Detail

      • showMainMenu

        public static void showMainMenu()
        The main menu where the application starts

      • doUserLogin

        public static boolean doUserLogin()
        Logs in a user using username and password (allows up to three attempts)
        Returns:
        true if user name and password match the database; false if not

      • checkLoginCredentials

        public static boolean checkLoginCredentials(java.lang.String username,
                                            java.lang.String password)
        Queries the users database for a user name and password match
        Parameters:
        username - the user name of the current attempt to log in
        password - the password of the current attempt to log in
        Returns:
        true if un/pw match found and false if not

      • doCreateUser

        public static void doCreateUser()
        Creates a new user of ServicePals

      • showScheduleProviderMenu

        public static void showScheduleProviderMenu(ServiceProvider p)
        Allows the user to schedule a time with the selected service provider
        Parameters:
        p - the SeriveProvider object for retrieving the schedule

      • processScheduleProvider

        public static void processScheduleProvider(java.lang.String serviceDescription,
                                           int providerUserId,
                                           java.lang.String serviceDate,
                                           int blockId)
        Processes the schedule request in the database (Creates a record)
        Parameters:
        serviceDescription - the description of the service provider's service
        providerUserId - the user id of the service provider
        serviceDate - the date of service
        blockId - the id of the service time block
